title: The Lost Compass
summary: Benny loses his compass in Sunny Forest, and his friends help him find it.

title: The Snowy Race
summary: Penny challenges Lola to a skating race across Icy Bay.

title: Banana Balancing Act
summary: Milo teaches Sammy how to juggle bananas without dropping them.

title: Moonlight Lessons
summary: Ollie uses a glowing lantern to teach Cleo about constellations.

title: The Savannah Song
summary: Tina and Daisy create a new tune while exploring the Savannah.
